title: Veigars Damage Output Seems Weak Lately?
body:
Started playing the game again just recently.  And Veigars damage output seems so weak lately.

As an example, in my last game, there was a Darius top who got semi-fed.   He built the following:
Spirit Visage ( 55 MR ) / Merc Treads ( 25MR ) / Frozen Mallet / Titanic Hydra / Black Cleaver / Death's Dance.
Enemy Team Comp: Shyvanna / Darius / Lux / Talon / Malphite  ( No Healers / 1 Shielder )

I was Veigar with 1400AP.  I had Void Staff in my build ( 40% Magic Penetration )

I literally did no damage to him.  Would land him stunned in my Gate - Drop a W on him and a Q .... and he would drop like 10% life.  

My abilities were doing (**Supposedly**):
Q = 1,154
W = 1,840
R = 325+(1,162) to 625+(2,310)

It seems that burst mages do barely any damage .... yet melee assassins were given massive true damage.  How is this balanced?

replies.body: Its because he has the same kit he had 25 years ago.   He cant compete with CT champs (like 75% of champs)

Yeah I don't buy it man. Sure he might survived, but I guarantee Darius took at least 30-50% damage. As a dar main myself who had built lots of Mr against being before, I can testify that veigar can easily deal 40-50% my house even with just 1000-1200 AP in a regular rotation.
I was just about to go download the video off my match history to make a few second video for you ... but it says the video expired even though it has only been 2 days ....
I need to see this. Recent game?
Yep.  Recent Games.  Like 2 games ago.
